forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers this morning. Partial clearing this afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers this morning. Partial clearing this afternoon. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain late. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain developing after midnight. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 37F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 36F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain with some snow mixing in in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain with some snow mixing in in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening then remaining overcast late. Low -1C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow in the evening. Low near 30F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.
